product_name: CliniqueTake It All Off Makeup Remover Gift Set
summary: SummaryClinique Take It All Off Makeup Remover Gift Set is a trio of fan-favorite formulas to gently cleanse and remove long-wearing makeup.
details: DetailsBenefitsSkin Types: AllThree ways to take it all off.Clinique's All About Clean Rinse-Off Foaming Cleanser gently and effectively rinses away pollution, dirt, excess oil, long-wearing makeup, and sunscreen.Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm transforms from a solid balm into a silky oil to melt away eye and face makeups and sunscreens. Cleans thoroughly, rinses off completely. In a travel-ready size.Take The Day Off Makeup Remover For Lids, Lashes + Lips is a liquid makeup remover that dissolves long-wearing makeup, even waterproof mascara.Free of: parabens and phthalates.Dermatologist tested.Allergy tested. 100% fragrance free.IncludesFull Size All About Clean Rinse-Off Foaming Cleanser (5.0 oz)Full Size Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm (3.8 oz)Take The Day Off Makeup Remover For Lids, Lashes + Lips (1.7 oz)HeadbandItem 2641054How To UseAll About Clean Rinse-Off Foaming Cleanser: Lather cleanser between palms with lukewarm water. Massage gently over wet skin, avoiding eye area. Rinse off. Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover: Use this makeup remover balm before other cleansers and treatment products. Massage cleansing balm over dry skin with dry fingertips. Rinse well with warm water. Pat dry.Take The Day Off Makeup Remover For Lids, Lashes + Lips: Shake makeup remover bottle well before using. Saturate cotton ball. Sweep on. Wipe off. Rinse with cool water before reapplying makeup.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: All About Clean Rinse-Off Foaming Cleanser: Lather cleanser between palms with lukewarm water. Massage gently over wet skin, avoiding eye area. Rinse off. Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover: Use this makeup remover balm before other cleansers and treatment products. Massage cleansing balm over dry skin with dry fingertips. Rinse well with warm water. Pat dry.Take The Day Off Makeup Remover For Lids, Lashes + Lips: Shake makeup remover bottle well before using. Saturate cotton ball. Sweep on. Wipe off. Rinse with cool water before reapplying makeup.
